1.text: And Benjamin begat Bela his first-born, and Ashbel the second, and Aharah the third,

2.text: Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.

3.text: And the sons to Bela will be Adar and Gera and Abihud,

4.text: And Abishua, and Naaman, and Ahoah,

5.text: And Gera, and Shephuphan, and Huram.

6.text: And these the sons of Ehud: these the heads of the fathers to the inhabitants of Geba; and they will carry them away captive to Manahath.

7.text: And Naaman and Ahiah and Gera, he carried them away captive; and he begat Uzza and Ahihud.

8.text: And Shaharaim begat in the field of Moab from his sending them away; Hushim and Baara his wives.

9.text: And he will beget from Hodesh his wife, Jobab, and Zibia, and Mesha, and Malcham,

10.text: And Jeuz and Shachiah and Mirma. These his sons, heads of the fathers,

11.text: And from Hushim he begat Abitub and Elpaal.

12.text: The sons of Elpaal: Eber, and Misham, and Shamei, he built Ono and Lod, and her daughters.

13.text: And Beriah and Shema, they the heads of the fathers to the inhabitants of Ajalon, they chased away the inhabitants of Gath:

15.text: And Zebadiah, and Arad, and Ader,

16.text: And Michael, and Ispah, and Joha, sons of Beriah;

17.text: And Zebadiah, and Meshullam, and Hezeki, and Heber,

18.text: And Ishmerai, and Jezliah, and Jobab, sons of Elpaal;

19.text: And Jakim, and Zichri, and Zabdi,

20.text: And Elienai, and Zilthai, and Eliel,

21.text: And Adaiah, and Baraiah, and Shimrath, sons of Shimhi;

22.text: And Ishpan and Eber and Eliel,

23.text: And Abdon, and Zichri, and Hanan,

24.text: And Hananiah, and Elam, and Antothijah,

25.text: And Iphedeiah, and Penuel, the sons of Shashak;

26.text: And Shamsherai, and Shehariah, and Athaliah,

27.text: And Jaresiah, and Eliah, and Zichri, sons of Jeroham.

28.text: These the heads of the fathers to their generations, heads. These dwelt in Jerusalem.

29.text: And in Gibeon they dwelt, the father of Gibeon; and the name of his wife Maacah:

30.text: And his son the first-born, Abdon, and Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Nadab,

31.text: And Gedor, and Ahio, and Zaccur.

32.text: And Mikloth begat Shimeah. And these also over against their brethren dwelt in Jerusalem with their brethren.

33.text: And Ner begat Kish, and Kish begat Saul, and Saul begat Jonathan, and Malchi-Shua, and Abinadab, and Eshbaal.

34.text: And the son of Jonathan Merib-Baal; and Merib-Baal begat Micah.

35.text: And the sons of Micah: Pithon, and Melech, and Tarea, and Ahaz.

36.text: And Ahaz begat Jehoadah, and Jehoadah begat. Alemeth, and Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begat Moza,

37.text: And Moza begat Binea: Rapha his son, Eleasah his son, Azel his son.

38.text: And to Azel six sons, and these their names: Azrikam, Bocheru, and Ishmael, and Sheariah, and Obadiah, and Hanan. All these the sons of Azel.

39.text: And the sons of Eshek his brother, Ulam his first-born, Jelrush the second, and Eliphalet the third.

40.text: And the sons of Ulam will be strong men of power, bending the bow, and many sons and sonsâ€™ sons, a hundred and fifty. All these from the sons of Benjamin.
